item.title: 加拿大原始荒野迎来钻井狂潮
item.description:
随着世界各国争相获得发电厂所需的燃料，天然气吸引了众多能源生产商来到加拿大最西部的省份。【原文：

As countries around the world scramble to secure fuel to run their power plants, natural gas has attracted energy producers to Canada’s westernmost province.

】

item.title: 据说三一重工很快将评估 15 亿美元上市意向
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，中国三一重工股份有限公司计划最早于下周开始评估投资者对该公司在香港上市的兴趣，此次上市可能筹集约 15 亿美元资金。【原文：China’s Sany Heavy Industry Co. plans to begin gauging investor interest as early as next week for a Hong Kong listing that could raise about $1.5 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 博雅银行因荷兰养老金风险取消交易员年终假期
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）的欧洲利率交易柜台在年底期间将保持满员状态，以应对与荷兰 1.9 万亿欧元（2.2 万亿美元）养老金体系监管转变有关的潜在波动。【原文：Bank of America Corp. is keeping its European rates trading desks fully staffed over the end-of-year period to be ready for potential volatility linked to a regulatory shift in the €1.9 trillion ($2.2 trillion) Dutch pension system.】

item.title: 希腊股市阔别十年后重获发达市场地位
item.description: 富时罗素（FTSE Russell）将把希腊股票升级为发达市场股票，在此之前，希腊股票在新兴资产类别中度过了十年，为欧元成员国债务危机后的经济转机加冕。【原文：FTSE Russell will upgrade Greek equities to developed-market status after the stocks spent a decade within the emerging asset class, crowning an economic turnaround following the euro member’s debt crisis.】

item.title: 英国央行称人工智能估值飙升引发市场修正风险
item.description: 英国央行周三表示，人工智能公司估值过高以及美联储独立性受到挑战，加剧了 "市场急剧回调 "的风险，这是英国央行迄今发出的最强烈警告。【原文：Stretched valuations for artificial intelligence companies and challenges to the Federal Reserve’s independence have fuelled the risks of a “sharp market correction,” the Bank of England said on Wednesday, in its strongest warnings yet.】

item.title: Ares 募集 53 亿美元用于基础设施二级市场交易
item.description: Ares Management Corp. 募集了约 53 亿美元，用于支持基础设施二级交易，因为投资者对此类资产的需求有所增加。【原文：Ares Management Corp. raised about $5.3 billion to back infrastructure secondaries deals as investor appetite for such assets has increased.】

item.title: 人工智能和美联储为 S&P 500 指数的狂飙提供了 "更多燃料
item.description: 美国股市从六个月前的熊市边缘迅速反弹，其速度和韧性将载入史册。而期待好时光继续的多头们也会站在历史的一边。【原文：The rip-roaring rebound in US stocks from the brink of a bear market six months ago will go down in history for its speed and resilience. And bulls expecting the good times to continue have history on their side.】

item.title: 策略师认为泰铢涨势不会持久的原因
item.description: 策略师称，泰国央行意外决定维持利率不变后，泰国货币周三的升势可能会逐渐减弱，因为货币当局似乎仍保持鸽派倾向。【原文：The advance in Thailand’s currency on Wednesday following the central bank’s surprise decision to hold rates will likely peter out as the monetary authority still seems to maintain a dovish bias, strategists say.】

item.title: 尼日利亚考虑加入其他非洲发行国的欧洲债券销售行列
item.description: 尼日利亚计划在第四季度出售欧元债券，筹集多达 23 亿美元的资金，有可能加入其他非洲发行商的行列，利用较低的借贷成本。【原文：Nigeria is planning to raise as much as $2.3 billion in a eurobond sale in the fourth quarter, potentially joining other African issuers taking advantage of lower borrowing costs.】

item.title: 人工智能发电热潮让核电股成为市场新宠
item.description:
过去一年中，Oklo 的股价飙升了 1,000% 以上，而 NuScale Power 的股价则增长了两倍。【原文：

Oklo’s shares have surged more than 1,000% in the past year, while NuScale Power’s have tripled in value.

】

item.title: 高盛的奥本海默否认美国科技股泡沫担忧
item.description: 现在担心高歌猛进的美国科技股出现泡沫还为时过早。【原文：It’s too early to be worried about a bubble in high-flying US technology stocks.】

item.title: 优美科股价大涨，因精炼厂出售黄金以在涨势中套现
item.description: 比利时回收和金属提炼公司优美科公司（Umicore SA）表示，将通过出售黄金库存获得 4.1 亿欧元（4.77 亿美元）的现金，此后该公司股价大涨 8%。【原文：Umicore SA shares surged as much as 8% after the Belgian recycling and metals refining company said it will generate €410 million ($477 million) in cash from selling its gold inventories.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长埃斯克里瓦表示下一步不一定是降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦（José Luis Escrivá）表示，决策者目前并不倾向于降息，他们同样可能最终加息。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member José Luis Escrivá said policymakers don’t have a bias toward cutting interest rates at present and could equally end up hiking them instead.】

item.title: 中国投资者指控 CEO 夺权后，游艇争端再起
item.description: 意大利豪华游艇制造商 Ferretti SpA 的管理层与其顶级中国投资者之间的争斗，在该公司因间谍丑闻而沸沸扬扬一年多之后，再次成为焦点。【原文：The battle between Italian luxury yacht maker Ferretti SpA’s management and its top Chinese investor is once again in the spotlight just over a year after the company was roiled by a spying scandal.】

item.title: 西班牙、法国和德国削减风力发电量创历史新高
item.description: 欧洲国家在今年前九个月削减了创纪录数量的风力发电，因为过剩的电力输出使基础设施不堪重负，无法吸收激增的可再生能源电力。【原文：European countries curtailed a record amount of wind power in the first nine months of the year as excess output overwhelmed infrastructure that was unable to absorb surges in the flow of renewable power.】

item.title: 通胀压力持续，冰岛维持利率不变
item.description: 冰岛央行在第二次会议上维持借贷成本不变，因为持续的通货膨胀阻碍了官员们在这个大西洋国家采取进一步的货币宽松政策。【原文：Iceland’s central bank kept borrowing costs unchanged for a second meeting as persistent inflation prevents officials from undertaking further monetary easing in the Atlantic nation.】

item.title: 美国众议院小组抨击 ASML 中国业务后，ASML 股价下跌
item.description: ASML Holding NV 的股价下跌，此前美国立法者指责这家荷兰芯片设备制造商助长了中国半导体产业的发展，从而引发了对该公司光刻机实施进一步出口管制的担忧。【原文：ASML Holding NV shares fell after US lawmakers accused the Dutch chip equipment maker of boosting China’s semiconductor industry, raising the specter of further export controls on the company’s lithography machines.】

item.title: 丹麦央行行长认为公寓价格上涨带来风险
item.description: 丹麦央行的一位行长认为，公寓价格上涨是经济面临的最大风险之一，他还淡化了诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）增长放缓带来的威胁。【原文：Denmark’s central bank sees rising apartment prices as one of the biggest risks to the economy, according to one of its governors, who also played down the threat from slower growth at Novo Nordisk A/S.】

item.title: Blackstone 聘用德意志银行的 Shah 担任私人信贷部门的最高职位
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 已聘请 Apurva Shah 在其印度私人信贷及保险业务中担任高级职务，这家另类资产管理公司正努力抓住印度对信贷需求不断增长的机遇。【原文：Blackstone Inc. has hired Apurva Shah for a top role in its private credit and insurance business in India as the alternative asset manager seeks to capture the country’s rising demand for credit.】

item.title: 摩根大通称，随着市场升温，M&A 的动物精神又回来了
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Animal spirits have returned in the M&A market, and deal activity is increasing on the back of an improved economic outlook, according to a top JPMorgan Chase & Co. banker who helped orchestrate the record financing for the $55 billion take-private of Electronic Arts Inc.】

item.title: 日本今年第二大 IPO 定价最高
item.description: 半导体材料制造商 Tekscend Photomask Corp. 周三首次公开募股的定价在区间上限，这是今年日本第二大上市交易。【原文：Semiconductor material maker Tekscend Photomask Corp. priced its initial public offering at the upper end of the range on Wednesday in this year’s second biggest listing in Japan.】

item.title: 随着折扣加深，印度炼油商可能会购买更多俄罗斯石油
item.description: 由于与华盛顿的贸易谈判久拖不决，加上供应充足导致折扣扩大，印度炼油商预计将在未来几个月增加从俄罗斯进口石油。【原文：Indian refiners are expected to boost oil imports from Russia in the coming months, as trade talks with Washington drag on and discounts widen amid ample supplies.】

item.title: 税收错误被揭露后，英国借款减少 20 亿英镑
item.description: 英国国家统计局（Office for National Statistics）称，在税务局发现增值税收据数据有误后，英国本财年前五个月的借贷比之前想象的要少 20 亿英镑（合 27 亿美元）。【原文：UK borrowing in the first five months of the financial year was £2 billion ($2.7 billion) lower than previously thought after the tax office found an error in its VAT receipt data, the Office for National Statistics said.】

item.title: 日元观察家考虑走弱的下一条线在哪里
item.description: 在本周的市场震荡之后，日元兑美元目前距离 155 这一关键心理价位仅有一线之隔，投资者开始考虑在财政部再次干预之前，日元必须要走多弱。【原文：With the yen now at shooting distance from the key psychological level of 155 against the dollar after this week’s market jolt, investors have started to consider how weak the currency must go before the finance ministry intervenes again.】

item.title: 泰国在新领导人领导下意外维持利率不变；泰铢上涨
item.description: 泰国央行在新行长威泰-拉塔纳功（Vitai Ratanakorn）领导下召开的首次政策会议上出人意料地维持了关键利率不变，打破了再次降息的预期，因为在经济脆弱和泰铢坚挺的情况下，官员们要保留政策空间。【原文：The Bank of Thailand unexpectedly kept its key interest rate unchanged at the first policy meeting under new Governor Vitai Ratanakorn, defying expectations for another cut as officials preserve policy space amid a fragile economy and strong baht.】

item.title: MiFID U-Turn为研究收费埋下伏笔
item.description: 欧洲的资产管理公司之间正在悄然形成一种对峙局面，有可能使该地区苦苦挣扎的市场更具竞争力的努力受挫。【原文：A quiet standoff is developing among asset managers in Europe that threatens to frustrate an effort to make the region’s struggling markets more competitive.】

item.title: 中国光学企业旭创光电据称考虑在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国光通信模块和设备制造商中际创新光通信有限公司（Zhongji Innolight Co.【原文：Zhongji Innolight Co., a Chinese maker of optical communication modules and devices, is considering a listing in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 达成英格鲁交易后，泰克下调旗舰矿山指导价
item.description: 泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd.）在与英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）达成十多年来最大的矿业交易之一后不到一个月，就下调了其智利旗舰铜矿的产量指导。【原文：Teck Resources Ltd. cut its output guidance for its flagship copper mine in Chile, little more than a month after agreeing one of the biggest mining deals in over a decade with Anglo American Plc.】

item.title: 淡马锡支持的 Foundation Healthcare 据称酝酿在新加坡上市
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由新加坡投资公司淡马锡控股公司（Temasek Holdings Pte.【原文：Foundation Healthcare, backed by Singapore investment firm Temasek Holdings Pte., is considering an initial public offering that could value the medical group at more than $1 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 欧尔班要求降息，匈牙利通胀率保持在目标之上
item.description: 匈牙利的通货膨胀率连续第十个月保持在央行的容忍范围之外，这给受到总理维克托-欧尔班政府降息压力的决策者们带来了难题。【原文：Hungary’s inflation remained outside of the central bank’s tolerance band for a 10th month, presenting a conundrum to policymakers under pressure from Prime Minister Viktor Orban’s government to cut interest rates.】
